SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service

Interface ProductService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductServiceImpl
public interface ProductService
This interface outlines the service operations for managing products in the system. It provides methods for retrieving, adding, updating, deleting, and associating products with designers and categories.

  • Method Details

    • getAllProducts

      List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products stored in the database.
      Returns:
      a list containing all available products; an empty list if none are found.

    • getProductById

      Product getProductById(Long productId)
      Retrieves a specific product identified by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the target product.
      Returns:
      the corresponding Product entity, or null if not found.

    • addProduct

      Long addProduct(Product product)
      Persists a new product entity into the database.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be stored.
      Returns:
      the unique identifier assigned to the newly stored product, or null if the addition failed.

    • updateProduct

      boolean updateProduct(Long productId, Product product)
      Updates the information of a product identified by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product to be updated.
      product - the modified Product entity containing the new details.
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeded, false otherwise.

    • deleteProduct

      boolean deleteProduct(Long productId)
      Removes a product, identified by its unique ID, from the database.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully removed; false otherwise.

    • getProductsByDesigner

      List<Product> getProductsByDesigner(Long designerId)
      Retrieves products that are associated with a specific designer.
      Parameters:
      designerId - the unique identifier of the designer in question.
      Returns:
      a list of products linked to the given designer; an empty list if none are found.

    • getProductsByCategory

      List<Product> getProductsByCategory(Long categoryId)
      Retrieves products that are categorized under a specific category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - the unique identifier of the category in question.
      Returns:
      a list of products under the given category; an empty list if none are found.

    • associateDesignerWithProduct

      void associateDesignerWithProduct(Long designerId, Long productId)
      Associates a product with a designer.
      Parameters:
      designerId - the unique identifier of the designer.
      productId - the unique identifier of the product.

    • dissociateDesignerFromProduct

      void dissociateDesignerFromProduct(Long designerId, Long productId)
      Removes the association between a product and a designer.
      Parameters:
      designerId - the unique identifier of the designer.
      productId - the unique identifier of the product.

    • getDesignersForProduct

      List<Designer> getDesignersForProduct(Long productId)
      Retrieves a list of designers associated with a specific product.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product.
      Returns:
      a list of designers linked to the product; an empty list if none are found.

    • setProductPopularityForTrend

      void setProductPopularityForTrend(Long productId, Long trendId, int score)
      Sets a product's popularity score for a specific trend.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product.
      trendId - the unique identifier of the trend.
      score - the popularity score to be set.

    • getProductPopularityForTrend

      Integer getProductPopularityForTrend(Long productId, Long trendId)
      Retrieves the popularity score of a product for a specific trend.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product.
      trendId - the unique identifier of the trend.
      Returns:
      the popularity score of the product for the given trend.

    • getAllProductPopularities

      List<Integer> getAllProductPopularities(Long productId)
      Retrieves all popularity scores associated with a product.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product.
      Returns:
      a list containing all the popularity scores for the product; an empty list if none are found.

    • getProductCountByCategory

      Map<String,Integer> getProductCountByCategory()
      Implementation of the method to get a count of products by category.
      Returns:
      A map where the key is the category name and the value is the count of products in that category.
